item.title: TON CTF 2024 Writeup
item.author: Qi Qin
item.description: Preface The TON CTF 2024, sponsored by the TON Foundation and organized by Tonbit and TONX Studio, was an exciting competition that featured 8 challenges. The tasks were divided into three categories: 3 easy challenges worth 100 points, 3 medium challenges worth 200 points, and 2 difficult ones valued at 300 points. What made this CTF unique was that all the challenges were written in Tact, a high-level language designed for the TON ecosystem.
